metadata.title: An early report from newly established laboratory- based influenza surveillance in Lao PDR

abstract.original_text: Please cite this paper as: Vongphrachanh P, Simmerman JM, Phonekeo D, Pansayavong V, Sisouk T, Ongkhamme S, Bryce GT, Corwin A, Bryant JE. (2010) An early report from newly established laboratory-based influenza surveillance in Lao PDR. Influenza and Other Respiratory Viruses 4(2), 47-52.
